alert.note: Alert for Coastal Jefferson; Coastal Wakulla (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Watch issued January 07 at 2:09PM EST until January 10 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY MORNING THROUGH LATE TUESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Moderate coastal flooding possible. * WHERE...Coastal Jefferson and Coastal Wakulla Counties. * WHEN...From Tuesday morning through late Tuesday night. * IMPACTS...Water levels will possibly rise quickly Tuesday afternoon as strong onshore winds push water ashore into Apalachee Bay. The potential exists for flooding of numerous roads and non elevated structures in Mashes Sands Beach, Panacea, Spring Creek, Saint Marks, and other low lying coastal areas.
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
